players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso I found last night."
Bob: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game."
You: "Bob is the mafioso I found last night and we should lynch him."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I found last night and we should lynch him."

Bob: "I'm innocent and I believe Alice made a false accusation last night. Let's give her the benefit of the doubt this time, but if she continues to make baseless claims, we should consider lynching her instead."
